name: downdowndown
description:
Menu:

  • A and D or Left and Right arrow key to move around menu
  • J or Spacebar to confirm menu choice
  • K to go back

Tutorial also available under "?" icon in menu. No online high scores for now.

In game:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move around
  • J or Spacebar to dash

Collect coins, destroy bricks in rapid succession to build up combo and score more points.

If you lose all hearts it's Game Over, buy upgrades in shop, and try again. 

Remember to equip bought items.

For some reason this game was made in Scratch.
